page.title: 09"Metheringham Shops"
page.content: Metheringham has an excellent selection of shops which supply most everyday needs . Also there is a free bus service to Asda Supermarket every Thursday.The Midland travelling bank comes every Wednesday. We have divided the shops into groups. NEWSPAPERS. METHERINGHAM' 5.00A.M-5.30P.M. FOOD MACE............9.00-6.00 HARDWARE ATKINS..........8.00-9.30 D.I.Y. ANDREWS(MEAT)...8.00-6.3O (BEANS) BAKERY..........8.30-5.30 9.00A.M- CO-OP...........8.30-5.30 6.00.P.M SERVICES LIBRARY..... POST-OFFICE.9.00-5.30 LLOYDS BANK...9.OO-5.00 (KINKS & CURLS)Hair Dressers 9.00-5.30 TOWNSENDS (AGRICULTURAL SERVICES & FARM MACHINERY)8.00-5.00 TEL.20207.
